pl.already_paired: This device has already been paired.
pl.autostart_after_message: Automatically start the bridge service, in seconds.
pl.certification_benefits: Another benefit to using certified plugins is, HOOBS support. Since HOOBS tests certified plugins, we are familiar with the plugin and can help troubleshoot issues. And in the event where the plugins is broke, we can work with the plugin developer on your behalf to help address the issue.
pl.certification_program: The HOOBS certification program helps promote plugins that work. We work with the plugin developer to address issues, and help keep the plugins simple and easy to configure.
pl.config_reboot_confirm: You need to reboot for these changes to take effect.
pl.confirm_action: Are you sure you want to continue?
pl.confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to leave?
pl.confirm_factory_reset: Are you sure you want to reset this device?
pl.confirm_reboot: Are you sure you want to reboot this device?
pl.confirm_refresh: Are you sure you want to refresh?
pl.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this device?
pl.confirm_restart: Are you sure you want to restart the bridge?
pl.country_code_message: Ustawić kod kraju, aby tam gdzie jest to urządzenie. Służy do prognozy pogody
pl.device_address: Enter the IP address your HOOBS device
pl.device_hostname: Assign a name for this device
pl.end_port_invalid: Port wyjściowy jest niepoprawny. Musi być to numer z zakresu od 1 do 65535.
pl.factory_reset_message: This will remove all plugins, configurations and settings.
pl.help_welcome: HOOBS is an ecosystem that aims to unify and simplfy the "Smart Home". We beilive that you should be able to use the devices you want, and not be locked into one provider's solution. If you want to use Google Home for your voice control and Apple Home for your routines, go ahead, HOOBS will make tht happen for you. HOOBS can connect your devices togeather by the use of plugins. HOOBS has "Certified Plugins", and it supports Homebridge plugins. This means you have over 1,000 choices when it comes to your Smart Home tech.
pl.home_pin_message: PIN użyty podczas dodawania Homebridge do Apple Home.
pl.home_username_message: Użytkownik Apple Home używa do identyfikacji Homebridge.
pl.homekit_disconnect: Spowoduje to odłączenie Homebridge od firmy Apple Home. Trzeba będzie ponownie parę.
pl.hoobs_unavailable: HOOBS is not available on this device.
pl.invalid_mac_address: This device doesn't have a valid MAC address.
pl.invalid_port_range: Nieprawidłowy zakres portów. Końcowy port musi być wyższy on początkowego.
pl.language_message: Ustaw język intrfejsu ręcznie lub ustaw na auto, aby użyć domyślnego języka przeglądarki.
pl.latitude_message: Set the latitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
pl.longitude_message: Set the longitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
pl.name: Nazwa
pl.plugin_select_device: Select a device to install this plugin.
pl.polling_seconds_invalid: Refresh interval is invalid. It must be an integer between 1 second and 30 minutes.
pl.polling_seconds_message: Refresh the accessory states interval in seconds.
pl.postal_code_message: Ustaw kod pocztowy do miejsca, gdzie to urządzenie. Służy do prognozy pogody
pl.range_name_message: Opis zakresu portów używany do identyfikacji zakresu portów.
pl.server_port_invalid: Server port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
pl.server_port_message: Set the main port the server runs on.
pl.service_description_message: Używany wraz z nazwą, aby pomóc zidentyfikować Homebridge w systemie.
pl.service_name_message: Służy do identyfikacji usługi Homebridge w systemie.
pl.service_port_invalid: Port usługi jest nieprawidłowy. Musi to być liczba z zakresu od 1 do 65535.
pl.start_port_invalid: Nieprawidłowy początek zakresu portu. Musi się mieścić pomiędzy 1, a 65535.
pl.temp_units_message: Ustawić jednostki, które mają czujniki Temprature wyświetlić.
